title: Movies DataBase
description: This website allows you to search for any movie. I developed it as a platform to practice my Redux skills and to gain hands-on experience with React Router and APIs for the first time.

title: Mini Social Media Clon
description: This website is a simple social media platform that allows users to create an account and share their thoughts. While it is not yet complete, I have plans to add many additional features in the future.

title: Grid Portfolio
description: This is my first portfolio, built using a grid system and animated with Framer Motion.

title: My movie list
description: This website allows you to create a list of movies you have watched or plan to watch in the future
